Whenever fortified land or this creature becomes tapped, exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a nonland permanent card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Reconnoiter {1}{G} [i]({1}{G}: Attach to target land you control; or unattach from a land. Reconnoiter only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)[/i]
